title: Slow cooker chicken, ham and leek pie filling
description: This is planning ahead- cook this tasty chicken pie filling a day ahead so that it's ready for topping with all-butter puff pastry.
ingredients: 6 skinless, boneless chicken thighs (about 500g/1lb 2oz), cut into bite-sized pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/31/2oz good-quality ham, torn into bite-sized pieces
